title: Remove Admin Panel from Website

requirements.text: Remove the admin panel button from the student Dashboard page (DashboardPage.tsx) so it is no longer visible or accessible to any user.

quotes: To remove a admin plane into the my website

acceptanceCriteria: The 'Admin Panel' button/link is no longer rendered on the Dashboard page.
No visual reference to the admin panel exists on the Dashboard page.

requirements.text: Remove the admin dropdown menu from the Header component (Header.tsx) so admin navigation links are not shown in the top navigation bar.

quotes: To remove a admin plane into the my website

acceptanceCriteria: The admin dropdown menu is no longer rendered in the Header.
No admin-related navigation links are visible in the top navigation bar for any user.

requirements.text: Remove the admin routes (/admin, /admin/dashboard, /admin/content, /admin/users, and any other /admin/* routes) from the TanStack Router configuration in App.tsx so admin pages are not reachable via URL.

quotes: To remove a admin plane into the my website

acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to any /admin/* URL results in a redirect or 404, not an admin page.
No admin routes are registered in the router configuration.

requirements.text: Remove the admin panel link/button from the Login page (LoginPage.tsx) so that after login, admin users are not redirected to the admin panel.

quotes: To remove a admin plane into the my website

acceptanceCriteria: After login, all users (including admins) are redirected to the standard dashboard.
No admin-specific redirect logic exists on the Login page.

constraints: Do not modify backend admin logic or remove admin-related backend methods â€” only remove frontend admin UI and routing.
Do not edit files listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
nonGoals: Removing admin functionality from the backend (Motoko actor).
Changing subscription plans or payment flow.
Adding any new features or pages.
